quizzes.title: Capital Cities
quizzes.question: What is the capital of France?
quizzes.feedback: Paris is the capital and largest city of France, known for its iconic Eiffel Tower and rich cultural heritage.

quizzes.title: Solar System
quizzes.question: Which planet is known as the Red Planet?
quizzes.feedback: Mars appears red because of iron oxide (rust) on its surface, earning it the nickname 'The Red Planet'.

quizzes.title: Basic Math
quizzes.question: What is 2 + 2?
quizzes.feedback: 2 + 2 = 4 is one of the most basic arithmetic equations in mathematics.

quizzes.title: Programming
quizzes.question: Which language is React Native written in?
quizzes.feedback: React Native is written in JavaScript and allows developers to build mobile apps using JavaScript and React.
